title: Stefan Jovanović
text:
Stefan Jovanović (; born 7 April 1994) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="right-back">right-back</a> who plays for <a href="FK%20Napredak%20Kru%C5%A1evac">Napredak Kruševac</a>.
Club career.
Born in <a href="Kraljevo">Kraljevo</a>, Jovanović came throw the <a href="FK%20Sloga%20Kraljevo">Sloga Kraljevo</a> youth academy. He started his senior career with <a href="FK%20Bane">Bane Raška</a> in the 2013–14 season and later he moved to <a href="FK%20Zvi%C5%BEd">Zvižd Kučevo</a>, where he stayed until the end of 2015. At the beginning of 2016, Jovanović joined <a href="FK%20%C5%BDelezni%C4%8Dar%20Lajkovac">Železničar Lajkovac</a> for the rest of 2015–16 season. In summer same year, Jovanović signed with the <a href="Serbian%20First%20League">Serbian First League</a> side <a href="FK%20Radni%C4%8Dki%20Pirot">Radnički Pirot</a>. After a half-season with the club, Jovanović moved to <a href="FK%20Zemun">Zemun</a> during the winter-break.
On 4 June 2021, he signed a two-year contract with <a href="FK%20Napredak%20Kru%C5%A1evac">Napredak Kruševac</a>.
